description: Enterprise techniques used by Bandook, ATT&CK software S0234 v1.0
name: Bandook (S0234)

techniques.comment: Bandook has modules that are capable of capturing audio.
Bandook is capable of spawning a Windows command shell.
Bandook has been launched by starting iexplore.exe and replacing it with Bandook's payload.
Bandook is capable of taking an image of and uploading the current desktop.
Bandook has modules that are capable of capturing from a victim's webcam.
